backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining product, category, user profile, and order types, with admin authentication, user profile APIs, and hot‑product management using access control and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new data model, adding fields such as netRate, mrp, isHot, and extended user profile fields while preserving existing data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files, describing their roles in routing, UI components, hooks, and application features.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with shared base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the root React application and loading the main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application root defining TanStack Router routes for public and admin sections with theme provider and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Admin-only route guard that checks admin session status and shows loading or access denied screens before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: A dialog form for creating or editing a product, handling product fields, image upload, validation, and submission via updateProduct.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductPho: Handles image file selection, validation, previewing, upload progress, and removal for product photos.
frontend/src/components/auth/CustomerLog: Displays a login/logout button tied to Internet Identity, managing authentication state and UI transitions.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users to enter profile details and saving them via a profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Provides the admin panel layout with navigation, session checks, logout handling, and guarded routing.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the public site layout with navigation, cart button, login button, and mobile menu, excluding admin routes.
frontend/src/components/products/AZFilte: Renders an A–Z filter UI with selectable alphabet buttons and a clear option.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays product details with image, pricing, category, quantity selection, and an add‑to‑cart button.
frontend/src/components/products/Quantit: Provides increment/decrement controls and manual input for selecting a clamped quantity value.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthGate.ts: Manages gated actions requiring authentication and triggers pending actions after successful login.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, categories, user profiles, and orders via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark modes with a medical‑styled color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About Us page describing the company, mission, vision, and commitments.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Shows all categories and provides a dialog form for admins to create new categories.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays admin stats for products, categories, and pending orders with links to management pages.
Provides an admin login form with session checking, credential normalization, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Shows detailed order info, customer details, and allows admins to update order status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Lists all orders with customer info, status badges, and links to detailed order views.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin UI page listing all products with add, edit, and delete actions using dialogs and product queries.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with item quantity controls, subtotal calculations, and checkout navigation depending on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles order submission, profile checks, cart validation, and shows success or empty-cart states.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form with simulated submission and displays business contact details and hours.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays hero content, loads hot products, and supports authenticated add‑to‑cart with profile checks.
frontend/src/pages/OrderHistoryPage.tsx: Shows the user's past orders with authentication gating and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed product information with image, pricing, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays a product catalog with A–Z filtering, profile checks, and add‑to‑cart handling with authentication gating.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing cart items with persisted state and helpers for adding, removing, and updating quantities.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Utility for storing, retrieving, and clearing admin UI session timestamps in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration with extended theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing schema version, existing features, and pending feature requests for profile, hot products, and pricing updates.
